org.joty.common

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joty.common.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    It is a collection of multi-purpose static methods thought for use in the Joty framework and in the Joty application.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Utilities.Stocker
      Stocker an HashSet descendant that offers simpler syntax of use.

      • daysQtyBetween

        public static long daysQtyBetween(java.util.Calendar startDate,
                                  java.util.Calendar endDate)
        Returns the quantity of days between two dates plus 1. The quantity may be negative, in this case 1 is added to the scalar. Dates are expressed as Java Calendar objects.
        Parameters:
        startDate -
        endDate -
